# Shabito

> Apps, bios, and tools for Chaturbate

## Context

I create Chaturbate bios and build apps and tools.

**Target audience:** Chaturbate content creators, cam models, and adult performers seeking professional bio designs and automation tools to enhance their streaming presence and audience engagement.

**Geographic focus:** Global (English-speaking), with work delivered remotely worldwide.

**Experience:** Custom bio design and app development specifically for the Chaturbate platform since 2025.

## Work

### Chaturbate Bios

A selection of Chaturbate bios I created:

- **Violeta Rain**, [violetarainn](https://chaturbate.com/violetarainn)
- **Ema Delacroix**, [emadelacroix](https://chaturbate.com/emadelacroix) [model deleted her CB account, bio not available anymore]
- **Lilith Nocturne**, [lilith_nocturne](https://chaturbate.com/lilith_nocturne) [model deleted her CB account, bio not available anymore]
- **Tatiana**, [sumersunsett](https://chaturbate.com/sumersunsett)
- **Evelyn Desire**, [evelyn_desire](https://chaturbate.com/evelyn_desire)
- **Hana Ming**, [hana_ming](https://chaturbate.com/evelyn_desire)

### Chaturbate Apps

Applications published on Chaturbate:

- [BetterNotices](https://chaturbate.com/v2apps/apps/41983e1a-betternotices): Smart chat notices with automation, dynamic placeholders, and link management.
- [ShowMoji](https://chaturbate.com/v2apps/apps/57d31a05-showmoji): Rotating hashtags and room-status indicator badges.
- [FollowMeter](https://chaturbate.com/v2apps/apps/4fc060e7-followmeter): Live follower tracker displaying real-time follower growth during a stream.

### Independent Tools

Tools and other apps I created:

- [CamKeeper](https://github.com/byshabito/camkeeper): A cross-site creator profile manager browser extension for Chrome and Firefox.

## Technical Stack

- **Platform:** Jekyll (static site generator)
- **Hosting:** GitHub Pages
- **Styling:** Custom CSS with CSS custom properties, responsive design, dark mode support
- **Fonts:** Inter, JetBrains Mono (Google Fonts)
- **Languages:** HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (vanilla)
- **Markdown:** Kramdown
- **Image formats:** WebP with PNG fallbacks
- **Icons:** SVG (inline and external)

## FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)

**What makes a good Chaturbate bio?**
Mobile-friendly design, consistent branding, and clear structure. Common sections include About Me, tips menu, room rules, and social links.

**Do you offer Chaturbate app development too?**
Yes. I build and publish apps for Chaturbate, including custom bots, overlays, and interactive features.

**Do you work with new cam models?**
Yes. I work with both new and experienced cam models.
